revised_title: Anatomy and Vascular System of the Lungs
tldr: The author examines the structure and vascular system of the lungs, focusing on the bronchial tubes, leaflets, and air-cells. They describe the arrangement of bronchial tubes and the role of bronchial arteries and veins. The study also discusses the pulmonary artery and vein systems, their connections with the bronchial tubes, and the blood circulation within the lungs.
